title: Director of In-Store Experience - Sports Equipment
text: Posted/Updated: 10-16-2015 Brief Job Description: This position is also responsible for establishing standards and implementation in all wholesale store concepts. The Director of In-Store Environment is responsible for leading the visual team and building strong partnerships, working   Since your site launched in 2000, WorkInSports.com has been the go to place for USA Baseball when we are looking to fill full-time openings and internships. Your reputation throughout the sports industry as a vital tool for job seekers and employers is well deserved. Thanks again! David Perkins
